<<<<<<< HEAD
By the King Charles by the grace of God, King of Great Brittain, France and Ireland, defender of the faith; to all and sundry his lieges and subjects, greeting. ... Miscellaneous Documents. 1650-07-27 England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II) Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
printed by Evan Tyler, [Edinburgh : 1650]
Title taken from caption title and first lines of text. Dated at end: Given at our castle of Sterling, the 27. of July. And of our reign, the second. 1650. Imprint from Wing CD-ROM, 1996. Arms 223; Steele notation: and Maiesty our. Reproduction of original in the British Library. Copy cropped at foot affecting imprint.
=======

printed by Evan Tyler, [Edinburgh : 1650]
Title taken from caption title and first lines of text. Dated at end: Given at our castle of Sterling, the 27. of July. And of our reign, the second. 1650. Imprint from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
